item.description:
Get a kick-start for improving your Spanish!

 

La próxima reunión es en Paneras Bread. Nos reunimos a hablar español en el segundo y cuarto miércoles de cada mes. Por favor únase a nosotros en conversación informal.

 

The next meeting is at Paneras.   We get together to speak spanish on the second and fourth Wednesday of the month.  Please join us for very informal conversation.

 

Nos vemos pronto,

Don
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us near the back of the restaurant.

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: SS Spanish Meetup @ Panera's in Braintree
